sentence.Network_en: He kept encouraging Rosie to find a place of her own.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不断鼓励罗茜为自己找个住处。

sentence.Network_en: It was encouraging that he recognised the dangers facing the company.
sentence.Network_cn: 给人希望的是他认识到了公司面临的危险。

sentence.Network_en: Encouraging teacher transfer would not, by itself, integrate the teaching corps.
sentence.Network_cn: 鼓励教师调动本身不会消弭教学队伍中的种族隔离。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语单词后缀_百度知道 ... acrid（ 刻薄的） encouraging（ 鼓舞人心的）， exciting（ 令人激动的），.
不定式和动名词做主语宾语的区别 - 豆丁网 ... disappointed 感到失望的 encouraging 令人鼓舞的-- encouraged 感到鼓舞的.
The university president ' s opening speech is encouraging ., 大学校长的开幕词鼓舞人心.
英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... surprising 令人吃惊的 encouraging 振奋人心的 indication 指示.

list.abs: 奖励的英文_百度知道 ... put a premium on 评论| encouragement 鼓励, 奖励 hortation 劝告, 鼓励, 忠告, 奖励.
词汇竞赛 - 中国习网 ... Circle 园 Encourage 鼓励 Courage 勇气，精神.
管理方法战略策略模型理论 ... 心理学 Psychics Psychology 激励 Encourage 标杆分析 Benchmarking.

entry.tran: 令人鼓舞的;振奋人心的;给人希望的
entry.def: Something that is encouraging gives people hope or confidence.

example.ex: There are encouraging signs of an artistic revival...
example.tran: 出现了鼓舞人心的艺术复兴的迹象。

means.word_mean: 1. giving courage or confidence or hope;

sentences.sentence: "the anxious child needs supporting and accepting treatment from the teacher"

means.word_mean: 3. tending to favor or bring good luck;

sentences.sentence: "a favorable time to ask for a raise"
"a prosperous moment to make a decision"

auth_sentence.content: If nothing else, he's encouraging math education.
auth_sentence.res_content: If nothing else, he's encouraging math education.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If nothing else, he's encouraging math education.

auth_sentence.content: We should be encouraging; we cannot dictate.
auth_sentence.res_content: We should be encouraging; we cannot dictate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We should be encouraging; we cannot dictate.

auth_sentence.content: Encouraging catholics to persevere to martyrdom for their faith.
auth_sentence.res_content: Encouraging catholics to persevere to martyrdom for their faith.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Encouraging catholics to persevere to martyrdom for their faith.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"状态物品,行业等"; 2. 表介词,"在……情况下……"; 3. 表形容词,"正……的或令人……的"; 4. "……的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: advertise做广告+ing行业→n.广告业;广告活动 adj.广告的;广告业务的
assume假装,假定+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.傲慢的,不逊的,僭越的
change变化+ing正……的或令人……的→正在变化的
correspond通信;符合+ing……的→adj.相应的,通讯的
discriminate辨别,歧视+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.有辨别能力的
encourage鼓励+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.鼓舞人心的
endure持久,持续+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.持久的,不朽的
engross吸引+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.引人入胜的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 非常的,极度的,胜过的,过度的
stems_affixes.word_buile: exceed超出+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.非常的,极度的,胜过的,过度的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 令人兴奋的,使人激动的
stems_affixes.word_buile: excite使兴奋+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.令人兴奋的,使人激动的
exhilarate使高兴+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.使人兴奋的
fascinate使……入迷+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.迷人的,吸引人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 谄媚的,讨人欢喜的,奉承的
stems_affixes.word_buile: flatter阿谀,奉承+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.谄媚的,讨人欢喜的,奉承的
forego居先+ing……的→adj.在前的,前述的
hard艰难+work工作+ing……的→adj.苦干的,不辞辛劳的
increase增加+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.日益增加的,增大的
inspire鼓舞+ing令人……的→inspiring灌输的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有趣味的,令人好奇[或注意]的
stems_affixes.word_buile: interest使发生兴趣,引起……的注意+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.有趣味的,令人好奇[或注意]的
invite邀请+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.诱人的,引人入胜的
out出+go走+ing正……的或令人……的→走出来→心胸宽→待人友善的
precede先于+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.在前的,前述的
promise允许,答应+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.有希望的,有前途的
refresh使清新+ing令人……的→adj.使心神爽快的
rivet铆钉,固定+ing正……的或令人……的→如铆钉一样把人钉[吸引]住→非常精彩的
threaten恐吓,威胁+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.胁迫的,危险的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 欠缺的,没有的,不够格的
stems_affixes.word_buile: want想+ing……的→想要的→欠缺的
account计算+ing状态物品,行业等→n.会计学
advertise做广告+ing行业→n.广告业;广告活动 adj.广告的;广告业务的
bank银行+ing状态物品,行业等→n.银行业
begin开始,首先+ing状态→n.开始
build建造+ing物→n.建筑[物],房屋,大楼 [同]structure
cloth布+ing物→n.服装,被褥
dance跳舞+ing状态物品,行业等→dancing舞蹈
engineer工程师+ing状态物品,行业等→n.工程[学]
feel感觉+ing状态→n.感情;心情;知觉;同情
fill填充+ing状态物品,行业等→n.充填物,馅
fish鱼+ing状态物品,行业等→n.钓鱼,捕鱼
floor地板+ing物→n.地板材料,铺地板

stems_affixes.value_cn: 立足处;稳固的地位,基础
stems_affixes.word_buile: foot足+ing状态物品,行业等→立足点
gloam变朦胧+ing状态物品,行业等→n.黄昏,薄暮
greet问候+ing状态物品,行业等→n.祝贺,问候
handwrite书法;笔迹+ing状态物品,行业等→n.笔迹,书写体,书法,笔势
happen发生+ing状态→n. 事件,意外发生的事
know知道+ing状态→n.知晓;认知
learn学习+ing状态物品,行业等→n.知识,学问;学习
leg腿+ing状态物品,行业等→legging绑腿
moor停船+ing状态物品,行业等→n.停泊处
open开+ing状态物品,行业等→n.开,开放,开始
shoe鞋+make制造+ing状态物品,行业等→n.制鞋修补皮鞋
change变化+ing正……的或令人……的→正在变化的
proceed进行+ing正……的或令人……的→行动,进行
age年龄+ing状态→n.成熟,变老
consider考虑+ing在……情况下……→v. 考虑,顾及,顾及,考虑到,认为; prep.鉴于,考虑到,顾及
fail错,失败+ing在……情况下……→prep.如果没有……
regard注视+ing在……情况下……→与……相关→关于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 考虑,顾及,顾及,考虑到,认为
stems_affixes.word_buile: consider考虑+ing在……情况下……→v. 考虑,顾及,顾及,考虑到,认为; prep.鉴于,考虑到,顾及

Sentence.sentence: There is, in our view, no real dispute here, we are all seeking the same thing, which is schools that better serve our children and our nation by encouraging students to tackle tough subjects under the guidance of gifted teachers.
Those are not the most encouraging words to hear just before eating lunch at one of Hong Kong's smartest British restaurants, Alfie's by KEE, but head chef Neil Tomes has more to say.
Encouraging positive thinking many do more harm than good.
A student writes what he thinks is an excellent composition, but the teacher writes no encouraging remarks.
He had read that speakers can be more persuasive if they invade the personal space of listeners, encouraging an emotional response.

Instead of protecting speech and encouraging diversity and innovative thinking, the tenure system often stifles(压制)them: younger professors must win the approval of established colleagues for tenure, encouraging like-mindedness and sometimes inhibiting the free flow of ideas.

sentences.en: From time to time,she gave him an encouraging nod.
I find what you have said very encouraging.
sentences.cn: 我发现你说的话非常激励人心。

sentences.en: It is encouraging to read that illiteracy is declining.
sentences.cn: 从读报中了解文盲情况正在好转,这是令人鼓舞的。

sentences.en: It’s encouraging to receive a favourable report on one’s study.
sentences.cn: 学习得到好评是令人鼓舞的。

sentences.en: Jack threw in the odd encouraging comment.
sentences.cn: 杰克难得加了一句鼓励的话。
